data.title: Bitcoin’s Death Cross Confirmed: Why This Time Might Be Different
data.description: Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) has triggered a classic technical warning. On November 16, 2025, its 50-day moving average crossed below the 200-day moving average, forming a death cross. The crossover came six weeks after Bitcoin hit a record high near $126,000. Historically, a death cross signals weakening momentum, but it’s often a lagging indicator that appears ... Bitcoin’s Death Cross Confirmed: Why This Time Might Be Different
